body.p:
The state of Kentucky
County of Jefferson

This day Charles Glass made oath before me a Justice of the peace for said county that one "Elliot" a slave (the property of Willis Field late of (Davis County Kentucky) has been guilty, of the crime of Murder in the Killing and Murdering of his master and owner the said Willis Field in the fall of 1862 and that the said "Elliot" is now a fugitive from Justice running at large in the state of Indiana That said Crime of Murder was committed by said slave "Elliot" in the County of Davis in the state of Kentucky,
Subscribed and sworn to before one a Justice of the peace this 9th day of February 1863
Jos. Clement J. P. J. C

Indiana
Requisition for Elliot (a Slave)
Murder
Requisition Iss Feby 12. 1863
R. Gilchrist
